name.japanese: ウシウシの実 モデル:野牛
name.romanized: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Moderu: Baison

abilities.description: Allows the user to transform into a full bison or a human-bison hybrid form resembling a minotaur.
limitations: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone

abilities.description: The main advantage of this fruit is enhanced speed rather than strength. The Beast Form allows the user to run at much higher speeds than in human form, making it ideal for transportation and creating afterimages in combat.
The transformation grants increased physical strength, particularly in the hybrid form which is suited for combat.

reveals.description: The Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Bison is revealed as Dalton's Devil Fruit power, marking the first appearance of this specific Zoan fruit in the series.
reveals.significance: Establishes the existence of the Ushi Ushi series of Zoan fruits and shows Dalton's combat capabilities.

weaknesses.description: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater, which drains the user's strength.
Standard Devil Fruit weakness to Seastone, which negates Devil Fruit powers.

abilities.description: Allows a non-human (in this case, a reindeer) to transform into a human or human-hybrid form, granting human intelligence and physical capabilities.
limitations: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone

reveals.description: The Hito Hito no Mi is revealed as the Devil Fruit that Tony Tony Chopper consumed, which allowed him to gain human characteristics and intelligence.
reveals.significance: Introduces the concept of an animal eating a human-type Devil Fruit, which grants intelligence and human-like abilities. This is crucial to Chopper's character and abilities.

weaknesses.description: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater.
Standard Devil Fruit weakness to Seastone.
